name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Capture the Moment'.
Instrumental interlude as the stage transitions for the next performance.
Performance of the song '褪せたハチミドリ' (Faded Honeybird) by Hoshimachi Suisei and AZKi.
scenes.song_name: 褪せたハチミドリ (Faded Honeybird)

subtitles.original: (We are with you We are with you)
subtitles.english: (We are with you We are with you)

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep looking at the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしてたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep holding that dream

subtitles.original: (We are with you Capture The Moment)
subtitles.english: (We are with you Capture The Moment)

subtitles.original: 触れた奇跡の中で
subtitles.english: Within the miracle we touched

subtitles.original: その先まで続く空にまぎれたら
subtitles.english: If we get lost in the sky that stretches beyond

subtitles.original: 君の場所と今を繋げたくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to connect your place and the present

subtitles.original: あの涙が今の僕らをつなげて
subtitles.english: Those tears connect us now

subtitles.original: この心に君のカケラがいるから
subtitles.english: Because a piece of you is in this heart

subtitles.original: 強くなくてもいい
subtitles.english: It's okay not to be strong

subtitles.original: 今の光を
subtitles.english: The light of now

subtitles.original: 僕と君と集う全ての空に放つ
subtitles.english: Releasing into the entire sky where you and I gather

subtitles.original: この奇跡を僕らでそっと輝かせるから
subtitles.english: Because we will gently make this miracle shine

subtitles.original: 咲かせようここから
subtitles.english: Let's make it bloom from here

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because you are not alone

subtitles.original: (We are one)
subtitles.english: (We are one)

subtitles.original: 褪せたハチミドリ
subtitles.english: Faded Honeybird

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲・編曲：宮田'レフィ'リョウ
subtitles.english: Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Miyata 'Lefty' Ryo

subtitles.original: 恋に恋してるあの子が
subtitles.english: That girl who's in love with love

subtitles.original: 口ずさんでた流行りの歌
subtitles.english: Was humming a popular song

subtitles.original: 反吐が出るくらい 甘い 甘い 言葉を踊って
subtitles.english: Dancing to words so sweet they make me sick

subtitles.original: くるまれてケミカルな菓子みたい
subtitles.english: Wrapped up like a chemical candy

subtitles.original: Ah Ah もういいよ
subtitles.english: Ah ah, enough already

subtitles.original: 並べたセリフで飾って
subtitles.english: Decorated with lined-up lines

subtitles.original: 隙あらば夜伽に誘って
subtitles.english: Inviting to a night-watch at every chance

subtitles.original: 求愛行動ってやつさ 痴れ者暴れ獣
subtitles.english: It's just a mating ritual, a foolish rampaging beast

subtitles.original: 気づいて 所詮愛なんて
subtitles.english: Notice that, after all, love is just...

subtitles.original: ...建前どこにもありはしない
subtitles.english: ...a facade, it doesn't exist anywhere

subtitles.original: 信じたいけど
subtitles.english: I want to believe, but...

subtitles.original: どうせ叶わぬ約束 綻ぶ愛情
subtitles.english: Promises that won't come true anyway, unraveling affection

subtitles.original: ただ綺麗な言葉はいらない
subtitles.english: I just don't need pretty words

subtitles.original: 未来永劫訪れない世界なら
subtitles.english: If it's a world that will never come for all eternity

subtitles.original: その手でいっそ止めて
subtitles.english: Then just stop it with those hands

subtitles.original: 枯れた思い出に浮かぶハチミドリ
subtitles.english: A honeybird floating in withered memories

subtitles.original: 二人肩並べ歩いた目黒通りの桜
subtitles.english: The cherry blossoms of Meguro Street where we walked side-by-side

subtitles.original: いつまでもずっとこのままでいようね
subtitles.english: Let's stay like this forever...

subtitles.original: ...囁いた声のまやかし
subtitles.english: ...was the deception of a whispered voice

subtitles.original: もういいよ 不埒な街を彷徨って
subtitles.english: Enough already, wandering through this insolent city

subtitles.original: 着飾った安酒に酔って
subtitles.english: Getting drunk on dressed-up cheap liquor

subtitles.original: 身を委ねておこう 私だって寂しいんだもの
subtitles.english: I'll just surrender myself, because I'm lonely too

subtitles.original: 不敵な罪を重ねても
subtitles.english: Even if I pile up bold sins

subtitles.original: 貴方は振り返りもしない
subtitles.english: You won't even look back

subtitles.original: 分かってるけど
subtitles.english: I know, but...

subtitles.original: どうせ果たせぬ結実 綻ぶ愛情
subtitles.english: Fruition that won't be achieved anyway, unraveling affection

subtitles.original: あんなに好きを重ねていたって
subtitles.english: Even though we piled up so much "love"

subtitles.original: 今じゃもう何事もなかったかのように
subtitles.english: Now, as if nothing had ever happened...

subtitles.original: ...外れてしまうなんて
subtitles.english: ...it just comes apart

subtitles.original: さよなら 純情 もう戻れないや
subtitles.english: Goodbye, pure heart, I can't go back anymore

subtitles.original: そんだけ大きな恋をしたんだ
subtitles.english: I was in love that much

subtitles.original: 全てが空ろの嘘に見えても
subtitles.english: Even if everything looks like a hollow lie

subtitles.original: 愛を探していく
subtitles.english: I'll keep searching for love

subtitles.original: どうせ叶わぬ約束 綻ぶ愛情
subtitles.english: Promises that won't come true anyway, unraveling affection

subtitles.original: ただ綺麗な言葉はいらない
subtitles.english: I just don't need pretty words

subtitles.original: 未来永劫訪れない世界なら
subtitles.english: If it's a world that will never come for all eternity

subtitles.original: その手でいっそ止めて
subtitles.english: Then just stop it with those hands
